title: Stock Taking Period Settings
confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this period?
only_active_period: Only active period can be changed

form.activate_period_automatically: Activate this period automatically after submission?
form.change_status_confirmation: By choosing the option to <BoldText>{{activate}}</BoldText> this stock taking period, <BoldText>the active period ({{periodName}}) will automatically change its status to inactive</BoldText>. Do you want to proceed with this process?
form.change_status_confirmation_in_list: Are you sure you want to proceed with this process?
form.disactivating_confirmation: This period will not appear in the list of period options during the Add Stock Taking process. Do you want to proceed with deactivating this period?
form.activating_confirmation: By selecting the option to activate this stock taking period, the active period ({{periodName}}) will automatically change its status to inactive. Do you want to proceed with this process?

validation.start_date_before_end_date: Period start date must be before or same as period end date

toast.create_and_activate_success: Period {{period}} was successfully added and activated
toast.update_and_activate_success: Period {{period}} was successfully updated and activated
toast.change_status_failed: Failed to change status of period {{period}}
